replies.author: James
replies.text: YES, let's stop him, we're NOT giving up !! We can do it !!!!!! After the fake production Trump pulled the other night pretending he was getting assassinated ðŸ˜‚ & now that Hillary is cleared yet again, as it should have been to begin with, Trump is going to lose even more votes !!! let's get down to business ! Vote Blue Everyone ! #Make History #NEVER Trump #Dump Trumpty Dumpty
